top_districts.name: Ixelles
why: Vibrant cafes along Place Flagey foster a bustling community atmosphere.
Parks like Parc Tenbosch offer green spaces for relaxation and children's activities.
watch_out: Noise from nightlife can disrupt evening peace in certain pockets.

top_districts.name: Etterbeek
why: Access to EU quarter enhances convenience for expatriates living and working.
Parc du Prince provides ample space for family activities and relaxation.
watch_out: Fast traffic in some streets poses a safety concern for young children.

top_districts.name: Saint-Gilles
why: Cultural diversity enhances the community experience with numerous dining options.
Close proximity to parks allows for family outings and outdoor activities.
watch_out: Certain historic buildings may require extensive maintenance.
